name: Ape Vine
description:
Help monkey to swing from tree to tree through the jungle.
Choose your favorite vine and character.
Increase the swinging motion by "rolling" your device screen.
Use the flying objects such as parrots, vultures & planes to help you through the jungle, but beware some may hinder your process and if you hold on too long, it could prove to be deadly!

Features:
* Universal app for all your i-devices 
* 3 locations, Jungle, Rain forest & City of the Apes
 * 6 characters to choose from and 6 different ropes
 * 3 different timed plays or unlimited
 * Amazing graphics 
* Addictive gameplay
 * Hours of fun!
